issue.title: subt_hello_world docker tutorial fails due to permissions

content.raw: Did you run `wstool update` from your native OS before creating the image?  This typically is returned if you created those workspaces for those external packages using your native OS and then try to run `wstool update` from inside of the docker image and it is unable to overwrite due to permissions.  Otherwise you should change the permissions of the folder to allow the `developer` user to make modifications to files in those directories.
content.html: Did you run wstool update from your native OS before creating the image? This typically is returned if you created those workspaces for those external packages using your native OS and then try to run wstool update from inside of the docker image and it is unable to overwrite due to permissions. Otherwise you should change the permissions of the folder to allow the developer user to make modifications to files in those directories.
